title: Rome Favorites
description: My personal travel recommendations for Rome

places.name: Colosseum
places.description: Ancient amphitheater and iconic symbol of Imperial Rome. Even with crowds, it's absolutely breathtaking.
places.personalNote: Get here early to avoid crowds - first entry is much more magical. The underground tour is worth the extra cost.

places.name: Trattoria Monti
places.description: Family-run restaurant specializing in cuisine from Le Marche region. Absolutely incredible food and wine.
places.personalNote: Ask Francesco about wine pairings - he has amazing knowledge. The carbonara here changed my life in 2019.

places.name: Gianicolo Hill
places.description: Best sunset spot in Rome with panoramic city views. Less touristy than other viewpoints.
places.personalNote: Bring a beer from the shop below and watch the chaos of the city from above. Perfect for contemplation.

places.name: Sant'Eustachio Il Caffè
places.description: Historic coffee roaster since 1938. Serves what many consider the best espresso in Rome.
places.personalNote: Stand at the bar like locals do. Don't be intimidated by the crowds - the coffee is worth the wait.
